categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Lev Kepzen was the captain of the Galactic Empire's EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Feral sometime around 0 ABY. That year, after leading an Imperial Naval taskforce—including the Feral—on a three-month hunt for the pirate band known as the Solar Terrors, Kepzen managed to capture the pirates at their base. Venslas Beeli, the leader of the pirates, surrendered when he realized that he was outnumbered.

Lev Kepzen was first mentioned in 1998's The Far Orbit Project, by Timothy S. O'Brien. The Far Orbit Project was a supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and had the same theme of the previous publication, Pirates & Privateers, as it followed the privateering vessel Far Orbit.
